summary: This code executes the Python script "transmit_bashls.py" and pipes its output into the Bash Language Server (bash-language-server), starting it up.

details.comment: This code executes the Python script "transmit_bashls.py" and pipes its output into the Bash Language Server (bash-language-server), starting it up.
details.content:
#python3 transmit_pyls.py | pyls
python3 transmit_bashls.py | bash-language-server start
